data.lyric:
[ti:Tequila Little Time]
[ar:Jon Pardi]
[al:Summer Love]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Tequila Little Time - Jon Pardi
[00:06.61]Lyrics by：Jon Pardi/Rhett Akins/Luke Laird
[00:13.22]Composed by：Jon Pardi/Rhett Akins/Luke Laird
[00:19.83]Pardon me I don't mean to pry
[00:23.29]
[00:24.37]I saw the tears fallin' from your eyes and I thought
[00:28.93]You're too pretty not to wear a smile
[00:32.37]
[00:33.18]Hope you don't mind if I sit down for awhile 'cause
[00:37.89]I want tequila little time with you
[00:41.89]
[00:42.48]A little salt and a lime will do
[00:47.20]Hey bar man will you bring us two
[00:51.60]I want tequila little time with you
[00:56.31]Talkin' it all out
[00:58.63]Seein' what you're all about
[01:00.69]I hope you want tequila little time with me too
[01:06.45]
[01:14.81]We don't have to talk about the past
[01:17.84]
[01:18.61]Here's to movin' forward and not lookin' back
[01:22.69]
[01:23.52]Little later we can take it to the dance floor but
[01:28.29]Until then let's order a couple more 'cause
[01:32.96]I want tequila little time with you
[01:36.65]
[01:37.17]A little salt and a lime will do
[01:42.08]Hey bar man will you bring us two
[01:45.74]
[01:46.27]I want tequila little time with you
[01:51.03]Talkin' it all out
[01:53.35]Seein' what you're all about
[01:55.58]I hope you want tequila little time with me too
[02:01.37]
[02:09.34]It's good to see you laughin'
[02:11.58]I guess this had to happen
[02:13.86]Now let's just get to dancin' 'cause
[02:18.45]I want tequila little time with you
[02:22.82]A little salt and a lime will do
[02:27.76]Hey bar man will you bring us two
[02:31.96]I want tequila little time with you
[02:36.77]Talkin' it all out
[02:38.99]Seein' what you're all about
[02:41.22]I hope you want tequila little time with me too
[02:47.06]
[02:50.86]Hope you want tequila little time with me too
[02:56.38]
[02:59.79]Hope you want tequila little time with me too
data.trans:
[ti:Tequila Little Time]
[ar:Jon Pardi]
[al:Summer Love]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:06.61]//
[00:13.22]//
[00:19.83]不好意思我不是想刺探你的隐私
[00:23.29]
[00:24.37]我看见你的泪水从眼中滑落我想
[00:28.93]你太漂亮了笑容满面
[00:32.37]
[00:33.18]希望你不介意我坐一会儿因为
[00:37.89]我想要龙舌兰酒和你相处片刻
[00:41.89]
[00:42.48]加点盐和青柠就可以了
[00:47.20]嘿酒吧兄弟你能否给我们来两个
[00:51.60]我想要龙舌兰酒和你相处片刻
[00:56.31]把一切都说出来
[00:58.63]看看你的能耐
[01:00.69]我希望你想喝龙舌兰花点时间陪陪我
[01:06.45]
[01:14.81]我们不必谈起过去
[01:17.84]
[01:18.61]敬我们勇往直前不要回头
[01:22.69]
[01:23.52]过一会儿我们可以去舞池但是
[01:28.29]在那之前我们再点几个吧因为
[01:32.96]我想要龙舌兰酒和你相处片刻
[01:36.65]
[01:37.17]加点盐和青柠就可以了
[01:42.08]嘿酒吧兄弟你能否给我们来两个
[01:45.74]
[01:46.27]我想要龙舌兰酒和你相处片刻
[01:51.03]把一切都说出来
[01:53.35]看看你的能耐
[01:55.58]我希望你想喝龙舌兰花点时间陪陪我
[02:01.37]
[02:09.34]看到你笑我很高兴
[02:11.58]我想这是必然的
[02:13.86]现在我们开始跳舞吧因为
[02:18.45]我想要龙舌兰酒和你相处片刻
[02:22.82]加点盐和青柠就可以了
[02:27.76]嘿酒吧兄弟你能否给我们来两个
[02:31.96]我想要龙舌兰酒和你相处片刻
[02:36.77]把一切都说出来
[02:38.99]看看你的能耐
[02:41.22]我希望你想喝龙舌兰花点时间陪陪我
[02:47.06]
[02:50.86]希望你想喝龙舌兰花点时间陪陪我
